attributes.action: Pass legislation to allow all registered charities to reclaim all the VAT they pay on spplies and purchases
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many charaities struggle to raise money and a significant proportion of the money raised is collected by HM Revenue & Customs in VAT. By allowing CHarities to reclaim all VAT paid by them on their supplies and purchases the charities would benefit greatly and have more funds to devote to their activities
